venue.address_1: Rte 135, near the intersection of Rte 85
venue.name: Hopkinton Commons

item.description: The "Prues BLues" band will be playing at this free concert in Hopkinton Commons. They play everything from Stevie Ray Vaughn to BB King to Eric Clapton. They've gotten great reviews and a free concert is never bad! I'll be sitting on a brown and pink chair. There are a lots of little restaurants and delis around the Commons to get something to eat, or you can bring your own picnic food. If you can't find me, I'll have my cell - 508-574-1115. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting on a brown and pink chair, and I'll have my cell phone.
item.name: Summer Concert Series at Hopkinton Commons
